displayName.text: Manhattan Comprehensive Night and Day High School

adrFormatAddress: 240 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: I went here a long time ago and must say it was a wonderful experience. The teachers were amazing and students were there to learn which is important when attending a public high school. I am so happy to say I received great scholarships to attend college once I graduated and it was all because of Manhattan comprehensive night and day high school. I hope the school continues to thrive because it was excellent years ago.

text.text: I went here a long time ago and must say it was a wonderful experience. The teachers were amazing and students were there to learn which is important when attending a public high school. originalText.text:
FINEST SCHOOL.This is a great spot of learning for students whose ages range from 17 to 21.That basically means our school provides a second opportunity for students to do further their studies. Every year we had profound enrollment of pupils from every corner of the world. I could even say it’s a big chance to know more about the varied cultures and traditions from our students because of our diversity. Students can attend either night or day classes while working full-time. Our graduates attend CUNY, SUNY as well as PRIVATE schools. Most surprisingly thing is some immigrant students who never have no prior English language experience can become experts in it. This school offers a regents diploma instead of GED.
I attended this school for almost two years and it was beyond my expectations. This school offers great aid in the field of academic and finances. The supports from our teachers are appreciable and unforgettable. With the help from Comprehensive Development INC, (the community based organization that works with our school), students could do internships in any fields and it provides paramount services in finance. Our college advisers personally help you to fill out applications for colleges and even financial aids forms. I am very grateful to this school and staff members who brighten my future.
In a nutshell, I will recommend this school to any student that want study and succeed in life.

originalText.text: YOU SHOULD COME TO THIS HIGH SCHOOL. I’m student from Manhattan Comprehensive Night and Day HS, and I will be graduating in January. I heard about this school from my former high school. I am writing this review to make sure that all young adults have the same opportunity as me. I would like to discuss about regents exams, as you know most students have a hard time with the regents exams. One thing that I like from here is that they help you to do better with them; also your English gets much better because you also meet with new people that don’t know your native language. My experience here has been extraordinary, in a way that I had met new people from another part of the world, my English also got much better than before. What is important is your future and your future starts here at Manhattan Comprehensive.

originalText.text: I studied here. Wonderful school, teachers that really care about their students. Student Life Center I can properly say have helped hundreds of young people over the years selfishly. I love this school so much.

originalText.text: I loved this school and I still do, I had some good temporary friends there, there were awesome teachers as well and the CDI staff even helped me get my first job, I would highly recommend transfer students to come here.
